title: Proposed City Campus of Technology, Dambulla of General Sir John	Kotelawala Defence University
decision_details: - General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University has planned to establish a City Campus of Technology in Dambulla to expand its services to civil students in Central, North Western, North Central and Eastern Provinces. It is planned to acquire the Administrative Building Complex in Dambulla city belonging to the Urban Development Authority on lease basis without constructing new buildings for the proposed City Campus of Technology, Dambulla and to administer the proposed City Campus of Technology as an independent institute governed under the Board of Management of the General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University. Accordingly, the proposal made by the President in his capacity as the Minister of Defence to establish the said City Campus of Technology, was approved by the Cabinet.
